title: How to Beat the Arena in Kirby Super Star Ultra

steps.headline: Select "Kirby Super Star Ultra" on the menu screen.
Select the game file that you are using.
Choose "The Arena" on the cork board menu.
When you are able to choose your power, select Hammer.
Leap onto the Warpstar to fight the boss.
Overuse the B-up move.
steps.description: It is the most powerful move at Kirby's disposal.

steps.headline: Continue fighting bosses until you defeat Marx.
steps.description: Remember that the bosses will be in a random order.

text: Turn on your Nintendo DS.  Select "Kirby Super Star Ultra" on the menu screen.  Select the game file that you are using.  Choose "The Arena" on the cork board menu.  When you are able to choose your power, select Hammer.  Leap onto the Warpstar to fight the boss.  Overuse the B-up move. It is the most powerful move at Kirby's disposal. Continue fighting bosses until you defeat Marx. Remember that the bosses will be in a random order.
